Posts.Content: I live my life in thanksgiving and gratitude. I stopped listing my treatments and clinical trials because it’s too much to keep up. It takes effort to do that at times but many people with or without cancer have their own issues they deal with. I have several friends who have lost their battle with this disease and if there is anything I learned from them it’s this. Don’t let cancer become who you are. As for the Home Depot guy he was rude no excuse. He could have apologized Each day you live is another day for chance at a good day. Today we have so much more available to us than our sisters before us. Don’t get me wrong there are days that my mind wants me to listen to poor me, but I try hard to focus on the blessings I have.
Posts.Title: The clerk called me "Sir" and my visit to Memorial Sloan Kettering.

Posts.Content: I started this trial almost 3 weeks ago. My second infusion will be this week. My side effects are manageable. Mostly nausea and fatigue. It seems like I deal with dry mouth a lot. I’ve had this with most treatments. I have Mets to my liver and bones.
Posts.Title: DS-8201
